verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%> Oh <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He is <S%H2896>good;<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H4448>speak<s%> of the <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H1369>deeds<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Or can <S%H8085>show<s%> forth <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H8416>praise<s%>?
How <S%H835>blessed<s%> are those who <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> Who <S%H6213>practice<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times!<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in [Thy] <S%H7522>favor<s%> toward Thy <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H6485>Visit<s%> me with Thy <S%H3444>salvation,<s%>

That I may <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H9186>prosperity<s%> of Thy <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H972>ones,<s%> That I may <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of Thy <S%H1471>nation,<s%> That I may <S%H1984>glory<s%> with Thine <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H5973>like<s%> our fathers, We have <S%H1>committed<s%> <S%H5753>iniquity,<s%> we have <S%H5753>behaved<s%> <S%H7561>wickedly.<s%>

Our fathers in <S%H1>Egypt<s%> did not <S%H4714>understand<s%> Thy <S%H7919>wonders;<s%> They did not <S%H6381>remember<s%> Thine <S%H2142>abundant<s%> <S%H7230>kindnesses,<s%> But <S%H2617>rebelled<s%> by the <S%H4784>sea,<s%> at the <S%H3220>Red<s%> <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>
Nevertheless He <S%H3467>saved<s%> them for the <S%H4616>sake<s%> of His <S%H8034>name,<s%> That He might <S%H3045>make<s%> His <S%H1369>power<s%> <S%H3045>known.<s%>

Thus He <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> and it <S%H9162>dried<s%> up; And He <S%H1980>led<s%> them through the <S%H8415>deeps,<s%> as through the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
So He <S%H3467>saved<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the one who <S%H8130>hated<s%> [them,] And <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H340>enemy.<s%>
And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> their <S%H6862>adversaries;<s%> Not <S%H259>one<s%> of them was <S%H3498>left.<s%>
Then they <S%H539>believed<s%> His <S%H1697>words;<s%> They <S%H7891>sang<s%> His <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
They <S%H4116>quickly<s%> <S%H7911>forgot<s%> His <S%H4639>works;<s%> They did not <S%H2442>wait<s%> for His <S%H6098>counsel,<s%>
But <S%H183>craved<s%> <S%H8378>intensely<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> And <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert.<s%>
So He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them their <S%H7596>request,<s%> But <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H7332>wasting<s%> <S%H7332>disease<s%> among them.
When they <S%H7065>became<s%> <S%H7065>envious<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> And of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H6918>one<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> and <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> up <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> And <S%H3680>engulfed<s%> the <S%H5712>company<s%> of <S%H48>Abiram.<s%>
And a <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>blazed<s%> up in their <S%H5712>company;<s%> The <S%H3852>flame<s%> <S%H3857>consumed<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
They <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5695>calf<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> And <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>image.<s%>
Thus they <S%H4171>exchanged<s%> their <S%H9202>glory<s%> For the <S%H8403>image<s%> of an <S%H7794>ox<s%> that <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H6212>grass.<s%>
They <S%H7911>forgot<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> their <S%H3467>Savior,<s%> Who had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>things<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>
<S%H6381>Wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> [And] <S%H3372>awesome<s%> things by the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>

Therefore He <S%H559>said<s%> that He would <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them, Had not <S%H4872>Moses<s%> His <S%H972>chosen<s%> one <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6556>breach<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him, To <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> His <S%H2534>wrath<s%> from <S%H7843>destroying<s%> [them.]
Then they <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> They did not <S%H539>believe<s%> in His <S%H1697>word,<s%>
But <S%H7279>grumbled<s%> in their <S%H168>tents;<s%> They did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
Therefore He <S%H5375>swore<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them, That He would <S%H5307>cast<s%> them <S%H5307>down<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%>
And that He would <S%H5307>cast<s%> their <S%H2233>seed<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And <S%H2219>scatter<s%> them in the <S%H776>lands.<s%>
They <S%H6775>joined<s%> themselves also to Baal-peor, And <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> offered to the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
Thus they <S%H3707>provoked<s%> [Him] to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H4611>deeds;<s%> And the <S%H4046>plague<s%> <S%H6555>broke<s%> out among them.
Then <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> up and <S%H6419>interposed;<s%> And so the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed.<s%>
And it was <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> to him for <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> To <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

They also <S%H7107>provoked<s%> [Him] to <S%H7107>wrath<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah,<s%> So that it <S%H7489>went<s%> <S%H7489>hard<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> on their <S%H5668>account;<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> they were <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> His <S%H7307>Spirit,<s%> He <S%H981>spoke<s%> <S%H981>rashly<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
They did not <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> them,
But they <S%H6148>mingled<s%> with the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And <S%H3925>learned<s%> their <S%H4639>practices,<s%>
And <S%H5647>served<s%> their <S%H6091>idols,<s%> Which <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to them.
They even <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to the <S%H7700>demons,<s%>

And <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H9345>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> The <S%H1818>blood<s%> of their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H834>Whom<s%> they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to the <S%H6091>idols<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> And the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H2610>polluted<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
Thus they <S%H2930>became<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> in their <S%H4639>practices,<s%> And <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> in their <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>
Therefore the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against His <S%H5971>people,<s%> And He <S%H8581>abhorred<s%> His <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
Then He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> And <S%H1992>those<s%> who <S%H8130>hated<s%> them <S%H4910>ruled<s%> over them.
Their <S%H340>enemies<s%> also <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> them, And they were <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H3027>power.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> He would <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them; They, however, were <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> in their <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> And [so] <S%H4355>sank<s%> <S%H4355>down<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
Nevertheless He <S%H7200>looked<s%> upon their <S%H9496>distress,<s%> When He <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H7440>cry;<s%>
And He <S%H2142>remembered<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for their sake, And <S%H5162>relented<s%> according to the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of His <S%H2617>lovingkindness.<s%>
He also <S%H5414>made<s%> them [objects] of <S%H7356>compassion<s%> In the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7617>captors.<s%>

<S%H3467>Save<s%> us, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> And <S%H6908>gather<s%> us from among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> To <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> And <S%H9576>glory<s%> in Thy <S%H8416>praise.<s%>

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> From <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> even to <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%> And let <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>"Amen.<s%>" <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%>
